address: 69 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014, United States
name: Bleecker Street Pizza

reviews.review: Great service.
Definitely a place you have to visit. The pizza is really that good.

Let me say this, 'I am a not fan of Pizza' rice is still my No.1. But everybody keep talking about this Pizza, the best pizza in NYC that they spent over thousand dollars to ship the cheese straight from Italy to America. And Yes! 100% that
Always the best slice in the village!!!
they weren't lying, really good pizza
Good service.
Nothing better than this place.

It was my last night in NYC.  I was sitting in my hotel room reading pizza reviews looking for someplace close (that I havent tried) that was open at 1am.  I discovered that Bleecker Street Pizza was open until 2am.  I raced to the
Very good pizza
La mejor se NYLa atencion es genialMe encantVolvera siempre

First time to New York and wanted to find the best Pizza place.  I tried out 3 places that were highly suggested.  This was hands down the best pizza Ive every had.  I now know I never knew what pizza was until I had their pizza.  The
Very fresh pizza. Remodeled with lots of seating.
Excellent pizza!
The best place to buy a pizza in New York, and the price is fair.

Amazing Pizza! Worth the trip. The line was short but there is also indoor/outdoor dining. Pizza goes for 3-4$ a slice. Perfect for the end of a night in the city. Friendly staff and excellent location. No parking. Theres quite a bit of a variety in pizza, I tried the Sicilian and it was delicious. Nice cozy place in the west village!
Overrated.  Very greasy. Nothing special.  There is much better pizza in New York.  Crust is meh.  Sorry bleeker st :/
Best pizza in NYC! Great prices, just be ready to tell them what you want
Best pizza I ever had.Fresh tomato chicken pizza tastes so unique, pizza crust is crispy, even kids love it. The sauce for garlic bread is full of tomato flavor.
EXPERIENCE !!!
Small place ,few tables, service was great ,my slice of Pizza Out this world!! So Delicious!! Going back Again!!
Nice
3.5 starsthe magic of Bleecker Street Pizza might be waning but the pizzeria still serves
It's bleecker street pizza can't say anymore

There was a delicious pizza. Excellent performance. It is suited for females. You should eat whether you are indoors or outside. It's been a hectic week. Some of them, I assume, were locals. It is really convenient if you live in the city.

- cheese slice is decent. I liked it better than overpriced Joe's- dine-in available with A/C (believe me you need this in hot summer)- restroom available (big plus point for tourists like us)- price is on point
Best of new York slices in lower Manhattan
Best pizza in NYC!!

Came from West V. For my birthday first time in New York City and bleeker street pizza is to die for my boyfriend and I highly recommend their cheese and nonna pizza is amazing!!! Definitely will be going back
On a food tour we setup for ourselves and this was on the list. The pizza crust makes this unique. The sauce had just a hint of spice so not too sweet. Loved it.
Best pizza in NYC!
Best pepporoni mushroom pizza ever!!
It was really good! Fast service.
There's a reason why this place is famous
Great pizza and fast moving line. Really enjoyed their signature Nona maria and buff chicken + the fact that you can order a casual drink too. They heat your pizza up so its super hot and crispy.
Good margarita slices!
Awesome gluten-free pizza. We totally lucked out by finding this place. The crust was slightly sweet and the sauce was simply amazing. Would recommend to anyone hanging around Greenwich Village.
The restaurant itself was grimey but the pizza was pretty decent.  Nothing mind blowing but it was a good,  cheap lunch stop.
Rating won't surprise although quality is off a tick.
A good group hug
One of my favorite pizza spots anywhere. Period.

The best pepperoni pizza I've ever had in my life. Great choice of other pizzas as well. Highly recommend this place since it totally lives up to the hype. You can get a slice for a reasonable price and it tastes heavenly. The location is also decent.
The  I found it regular
I had a cheese slice and a veggie! The best was the veggie: decent toppings and perfect dough. The flavor is on the stage. I had the most delicious pizza here.

Good pizza at decent prices! They have pre-made slices and you select what you want, then they heat it up. I suggest avoiding the pizzas with chicken on top; the rest of the toppings were great, though.
It is phenomenal most definitely

Bleeker Street pizza was so delicious!  The best weve had in NYC.  It was so lovely to meet Greg this past Friday.  He spent some time giving us the history of the restaurant.  Great hospitality!  Thanks Greg from your new Maryland friends!
Nonna pizza is definitely the best pizza I have tried in NY. It is a must
Pizza is phenomenal and the outside dining view is great.
I recommend the Nonna Maria it's Straight fire
The staff is funny and edgy and great pizza/beer.Must stop forsure.
Chaotic purchasing experience but the pizza slaps
Amazing pizza. $4 slice.Cheese is delicious and so sticky. Pepperoni and sausage were so amazing. I'd definitely recommend if you're around the area.
Pizza was mediocre  . The taste was flat. I heard it was the best pizza in Manhattan. It wasn't. I had a slice with mushrooms, it was soggy, especially the crust.
One of my favorite pizza
Good stuff!
Perfectly fine late night pizza
Amazing pizza! Anddddd they have gluten feee pizza! The guy at the counter was great too!
Nonna Maria is the best pizza I've ever had in my life. Greg is the nicest person that you'll ever meet and he has a phenomenal location. Bleecker Street Pizza has the best pizza in the City!
Nonna maria pizza was great. Crust was crispy and its delicious. Parmesan bread was great as well with marinara dipping. Prices are appropriate. I would highly recommend to others
has completely gone downhill

Will never go back and would recommend no one else does unless you want to be treated like something the cashier just wiped of the bottom of her shoe. Unbelievably rude and obnoxious, ruins the whole experience from the start.

Visited this famous pizza place during the weekend,there was a long line but with a short wait time. I was quite excited to try after I've heard so much however there were only 3 options all with chicken (bbq, ranch and one more option I
Perfect crust and good combination of ingredients.
Good pizza but awful Service. Cashier lady is very rude

Disrespectful of customers time 3rd time of ordering in a row where delivery is taking over 1:15..   Each time they would give a time I would call back 10 minutes after the time and ty ewould say more time and then sorry we are busy and made me wait another 30 minutes.
The best

The Nonna Maria is hands down the best pizza Ive ever had. The sauce is a miraculous, chunky delight that tastes like dessert without a hint of sugar. Pure decadence. Pizza like this is perfected over generations. One of the owners, Greg,
Bleecker Street Pizza is a staple of NYC.  Open until 4am.....the city that never sleeps has somewhere to eat.

I had a Nonna Maria slice today.   It has fresh mozzarella on it and that's not right!   Fresh mozzarella doesn't melt properly, and when you cook it, it loses it's fresh milky taste. The balance between cheese and tomato sauce is key, and
Not Joe's, but hey it hits different when you need that cheesy slice.
Was the best cheap pizza at one point
Really great pizza. Walked in and ordered,set down and eat. The manager kept apologizing for the air conditioning not working..
Stopped in as part of a food tour (Greenwich Village by Nice Guy Tours).  Had what was a half slice of margherita pizza, and it was excellent!  Will have to come back to have a full slice :)

A great slice from a New York institution! Their signature is a crunchy and structured crust that crumbles like biscuit (sounds weird but tastes great!) My recommendation is the veggie slice, the toppings are fresh and delicious and go well with the aforementioned crust
Must try: Nonna Maria and Chicken Chipotle.
Pizza was good but can't say it is the best...for the same price I can get better
Awesome place.  If you get the chance to eat here I would highly recommend it.  You have to get the nona pizza
Their pizza is not in the same league with that from Joes.
Top 5 pizza in the city. Love the crust more than almost anywhere.
I had the Nonna Maria, and didnt liked it at all. I think they have to much MSG in their Sauce

For this native NY'er, the best slice pizza in NYC (including Joe's, a block west, which is a bit thinner and drier [and Bleecker uses a little corn meal on the bottom--and better cheese]). In 65 years I've tried all of Manhattan's and many
""Great atmosphere and service, also an amazing selection of music playing.""
I had the chicken bacon ranch pizza... it honeslty may have been the best pizza I have ever had. The garlic knots are meh. But I got those 2 things and a drink for 10 bucks, very worth the price!
I ordered delivery and it took 2 hours before I had to cancel. The restaurant assured me it would be delivered well before and I didn't receive anything in the end. Very disappointing.
We did a pizza crawl, grabbing a slice all over and this was our favorite. The crust was excellent. Recommend it over Joe's.
NYC Pizza Joint. Thats all you need to know.
"Great atmosphere and service, also an amazing selection of music playing."
Love the crust, the two pizzas we tried was amazing. Plan to come again when come back to visit NY again.
Always good pizza
Wasnt that great of a slice
No exaggeration, best pizza I've ever had. I just keep coming back. From the Nonna to the Sicilian, you won't find a better slice in the city.
Best pizza. So delicious
Amazing pepperoni pizza slices.  The crust is delicious and the pizza has so much flavor!!
Can't stress this enough. GET... THEIR... SPECIAL MARGARHITA PIZZA.
Iconic city pizzaon the greasier side but definitely worth it.
Great tasting pizza. I would definitely recommend this place.
Finally got in to try the nonna Maria...It did not disappoint. Very tasty with excellent structure and zero flop! Happy to finally try it.
Really recommend it. The best pizza I have tested in a really long time. Will go there more frequently.
Delicious pizza!
Drunk pizza good pizza
Best pizza in NYC indeed, you will want to come back here. I enjoyed the white slice and pepperoni slice too. Great service, easy to see this place from outside the street.
Some of the best NYC style pizza in the city. The fresh mozz and jalopeno pepperoni are a must try
Have tried several pizza places and this is the best we have tried in New York. Would recommend and wish we found it sooner

The pizza is good but not great. Sadly, it has gone downhill since it changed ownership a couple years ago. We also were treated very rudely by the woman working the register, and the indoor trash can was overflowing onto the floor. I have

The taste was exquisitely good! When it comes to providing tasty pizza and pasta, this pizza and pasta restaurant deserves to be on top. I love the taste of it very much, and I'm glad it was all provided at a fair cost. I'm sure I'll come back here again and bring with me my family or friends. Thank you, everybody! The best you are!
Excellent pizza place!!
This is probably the best pizza I've ever had in my life. Previous for sure fav was Dani's in queens, for reference. Lol
Some of the best NYC pizza
Both indoors and outside seating were available. Reservations were not necessary. Amazing food. I recommend this store for pizza.
Best NY style pizza
OMG - All I can say is AWESOME
Very good pizza.  However, the crust is a bit too thick for my liking.  On par with Joes and this place takes credit cards which is a plus.

Great pizza and at first good service. I was visiting New York and looking for a place to eat out late, i read this place was good. I was almost kicked out though, the employee said they had to had to empty the place by 11 pm. There are was
Great food and great service. Will come back for another meatball hero ^_^
Ridiculously good
One of the top 10 in New York.
Good slice of pizza. But not the best in NYC
Super places!
This is literally the best pizza Ive ever had. I was missing the taste even after getting back home lol. I tried the veggie pizza, its called the grandma pizza on the menu. Just YUM!

The best slice of pizza I've ever had. It was at the end of a night of bar-hopping so it gets an asterisk for a non-sober pizza review. Still, I can't think of a better slice. Hoping to return soon and possibly sober to update.
Fast paced, heavily trafficed. Serving quality, crispy, delicious pizzas. Much of what everyone else is stating. Good to the last bite....
Some of the best pizza I've ever had!
Classic NYC slice
Great selection.... Solid Pizza;  Good crust, and the pizza is all fresh, unlike a lot of other places in this area.
Legit pizzas! love the variety and staff is very awesome!
Delicious
Has a variety of pizza options and they allow indoor and outdoor dining. The area is clean and the staff are friendly.
Delicious!!  Thin crust with substance!
The worst pizza slices I have ever tried. The pizza was preheated multiple times and it was as if I was eating rocks.I am never coming back here!
The place is the most lousy in manhatan
Pizza very good, gentleman behind cash register with glasses a real di_k
Best pizza in NYC by far!
Best pizza ever! One of our favorites! Always need to swing by and grab a pie when in the city!
Prepped & delivered hot & fresh. Had the mushroom slice. It was ok, the crust was so good!
My favorite pizza in New York City. Tatiana and the crew crush it - delicious pies and slices with excellent customer service
Same rating as sweetgreen
Will absolutely return. We have visited this pizza shop each time we're staying in Los Angeles and have never been disappointed. The atmosphere is cozy and the pizza is great!
Good Environment Good Food !! Cheers

Bleeker street pizza is my go to New York slice. If you visit NY you have to come here and eat a nonna Maria slice, it's their specialty and you don't need to bother trying anything else, you'll want to eat it over and over again. The
This has been one of the best pizza that Ive ever tried. I feel so happy to have had the pleasure to eat it.
Not a great Rep of NYC style pizza.  More for tourists who don't know.
Nice guys at the counter.
My new favorite pizza placeStaff here are friendly and they have plenty of outdoor searing. The breaded chicken was amazing. Nona Maria slice is what they are most famous for - it is light and fresh.
Best pizza in NYC - have tried many places and this is my go-to!Reasonably priced too!

We came here with my friends last night because we were hungry for pizza. I took a bite as soon as it was set on the table. It was an incredible pizza and pasta made with organic flour and top-notch ingredients. With my dad, I will return to this restaurant. For anyone who loves pasta or pizza, this is a must-visit spot.
fantastic pizza .. so yummy
My new favorite pizza place.
The best pizza in the Village hands down.
delicious pizza
great customer service. Pizzas are only one giant size, but you can buy per slice as well.
Excellent
always a contender when trying to find the best nyc !
Best place for late night pizza . Always fresh and staff is friendly!!
Good place for a basic slice.
If you are looking for a fast eating place for a cheap price this is the place where you should go.
The cheesiest cheese and crustiest crust and sauciest sauce pizza Ive had in Manhattan. Comes out hot enough to burn your mouth in the dead winter night.
"The crust is crispy; sauce flavorful; cheesy goodness with perfect toppings!"
Great spot for good pizza with friends and family! Can't go wrong
We went here for lunch. This place was clean, the staff was nice, the service was quick, and pizza was delicious. If we will be in neighborhood again, will definitely eat here again.

Delicious pizzas and pasta! My mother and I went to dinner last night and shared a pizza and a pasta dish. They were both delicious and all ingredients are locally made. They've even got various drinks to sell. It was a great value for money, too. Even my mother asked me to come back earlier. Thank you guys!
Definitely a favorite pizza joint in the city!
Plain slice was Nostalgic to me. Tasted like the old Rosario's pizzeria in Woodside.
Fantastic NYC pizza.
Ordered the cheese pie. Great!
Best pizza in NYC
This is Top Notch Pizza. The sauce is great and it is perfectly proportioned.

It's some of the best pizza in NYC. My wife and I tried the pepperoni, it was fantastic. We talked to someone, I think it may have been an owner or manager. He was very friendly. It's a cool place. Prices are fair too.
My favorite location for quality pizza. entered near ten, it was not crowded. the prices are fair for the quality of food.
Great pizza. Mushroom slice and margarita slice are my aces
Fine spot for delicious pizza. There was fast and courteous service. This place has a cool design.
mushroom olives and you won't be dissatisfied.
Got Food poisoning
Great pizza  great experience

We ordered through doordash to be delivered to our hotel. I was very surprised by the size of the pizza. We were able to eat it for three meals. We ordered eggplant grandma pizza. The dont recommend the garlic bread- its just a sub bread with minced garlic on top( not even crispy enough)
LOVE LOVE LOVE. Will be back. Maybe today.
One of the best pizza places in NYC!
One of my favorite pepperoni slices in manhattan. I think they mightve changed owners so hopefully the quality stays the same.
Great pizza yes! But when I order a Pepperoni Pie thats what I expect, NOT 8 slices stacked around a pie box!
The definition of "OK but not great." If you're hungry, go for it. Otherwise, go to Joe's.
What a pizza So delicious.
Great pizza. Some of the best on NYC!
One of the best pizza places I have ever seen!
